text: The Eiffel Tower is absolutely magnificent! The views from the top are breathtaking and the iron structure is an engineering marvel. A must-visit in Paris!
Iconic landmark that lives up to the hype. Beautiful at night when it's lit up. I recommend going in the evening for the best experience.
Amazing experience! Went during sunset and the views were spectacular. The tower is even more beautiful than in photos.
The Louvre is incredible! So much art and history in one place. The Mona Lisa is smaller than expected but the museum itself is a masterpiece.
World-class museum with amazing collections. The building itself is as beautiful as the art inside. Book tickets in advance!
Absolutely stunning museum. The Egyptian collection is fantastic and the architecture is breathtaking. A cultural treasure.
Beautiful monument with great views of the Champs-Élysées. The climb to the top is worth it for the panoramic views of Paris.
Nice monument but nothing special. The area is very touristy and crowded. You can see it well enough from the street.
Impressive architecture and rich history. The view from the top gives you a great perspective of Paris' layout. Highly recommended!
Overpriced for what it is. Just a monument you can walk around for free. Don't waste money going to the top.
Even under restoration, Notre-Dame remains magnificent. The gothic architecture is stunning and the area around it is beautiful.
Sad to see it damaged but still impressive from the outside. Looking forward to seeing it fully restored in the future.
A masterpiece of gothic architecture. The façade is incredibly detailed. Can't wait for the restoration to be complete.
Beautiful basilica with amazing views over Paris. The climb up to Montmartre is worth it. Free to enter and very peaceful inside.
Stunning basilica and the views from the steps are incredible. Great place to watch the sunset over Paris.
Relaxing way to see Paris from a different perspective. The evening cruise with dinner was romantic and the views were beautiful.
Great way to see multiple landmarks in one trip. The boat was comfortable and the guide was knowledgeable about Paris history.
Fantastic museum for Impressionist art! Van Gogh, Monet, and Renoir collections are outstanding. Much more manageable than the Louvre.
Beautiful building and great art collection. Less crowded than other major museums. The Van Gogh paintings are incredible.
Good museum but limited collection compared to other major museums. The building itself is more interesting than some exhibits.
